title: Migraine

en: While working, you suddenly notice a dark spot in your vision. You can't read clearly, and you know what this means - you're about to get a migraine! How do you handle it?

yes_caption: Take some medicine and push on
no_caption: Finish up and go lay down

en: You take some medicine and keep working, but in no time the migraine hits. The medicine was no help. You're unable to keep going and take the night off.
You shut off all lights and crawl into bed. You feel bad about the work that's not getting done, but after a while realize you probably needed a break.
